coe528.project

Class AccountManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • coe528.project.AccountManager

  • public class AccountManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements functionality to validate manager/customer login, add a customer, delete a customer, save a customer to a file and read a customer from a file.
